entry.title: Original Dartmouth College BASIC manual (1964)
entry.quote: Typing is no substitute for thinking,

entry.title: Six Chart Design Lessons from Visualizations of COVID-19
entry.quote: Important reminders for social scientists when creating visualizations

entry.title: Experiments On A $50 Diy Air Purifier You Can Make In 30s
entry.quote: If you’re in a hurry, this post says that if you strap two HEPA filters to a box fan, it will clear the air of basically all the particles we can measure, and it will do it faster than a commercial filter that costs twice as much.

entry.title: In 2021, We Need To Fix America’s Internet
entry.quote: We pay twice as much as Europe for high speeds, assuming we can even get them

entry.title: Cloudflare and Apple design a new privacy-friendly internet protocol
entry.quote: Dubbed Oblivious DNS-over-HTTPS, or ODoH for short, the new protocol makes it far more difficult for internet providers to know which websites you visit.
